column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sun Warrior chief says : " If you 're going to see the masters , you must bring them a piece of the Eternal Flame .
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " You will each take a piece of it to the masters , to show your commitment to the sacred art of firebending .
#Text=" Aang says : " Umm , Mister Sun Chief Sir , yeah , I 'm not a firebender yet .
#Text=Could n't my friend here carry my fire for me ?
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " No .
#Text=This ritual illustrates the essence of Sun Warrior philosophy .
#Text=You must maintain a constant heat .
#Text=The flame will go out if you make it too small .
#Text=Make it too big , and you might lose control .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry , I 'm just a little nervous .
#Text=It 's like a little heartbeat .
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " Fire is life , not just destruction .
#Text=You will take your flames up there .
#Text=The cave of the masters is beneath that rock .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hurry up .
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't .
#Text=If I walk too fast , my flame will go out .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Your flame 's gon na go out because it 's too small .
#Text=You 're too timid , give it more juice .
#Text=" Aang says : " But what if I ca n't control it ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " You can do it .
#Text=I know you can .
#Text=You 're a talented kid .
#Text="
